persona:
Procurement Manager at a mid-sized IT company.
Goals: Cost-efficiency, ease of integration, security compliance.
Pain Points: Vendor lock-in, non-compliance risks, poor onboarding.
job:
Evaluate and shortlist the most secure and scalable electronic signature platforms
for organization-wide rollout by Q4.

matched_sections.content: This report evaluates multiple e-signature solutions based on criteria like compliance, cost, and scalability.
Platforms like DocuSign and Adobe Sign are highly scalable with global data centers and auto-scaling
All platforms reviewed are compliant with eIDAS and ESIGN standards. AES-256 encryption is supported by
Basic tiers start at $10/user/month. Enterprise pricing is flexible based on volume and SLA terms.
